name: The NEON Serum
description:
Escaping a mad medieval alchimist complex would be hard enough with a weapon... sadly you don't have one, just an Injector! Use the various serums littered thruought the level to pit the guards against each other, and LET THERE BE CHAOS!

Beware, some serums aren't yet ready, and may cause an explosive reaction!

CONTROLS

WASD to move, SPACE to jump, SPACE NEAR A LEDGE to ledge grab, LMB to shoot, SHIFT to sprint.

This is my submission for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2, and also my first 3d game. Feedback is welcome and constructive criticism is encouraged!
